intro.title: Introduction
intro.text1: Color Me Crazy Hair Salon and Beauty Studio Ltd. (hereinafter: Service Provider) is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy provides detailed information about how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.
intro.text2: Data processing is carried out in accordance with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - Regulation 2016/679) and Hungarian Act CXII of 2011 on the Right to Informational Self-Determination and Freedom of Information (Info Act).

dataProcessed.title: Personal Data Processed
dataProcessed.intro: The Service Provider may process the following personal data:
dataProcessed.name: Name (first name, last name)
dataProcessed.appointment: Appointment-related data (service type, date/time, special requirements)
dataProcessed.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, operating system, cookie identifiers)

purposes.title: Purpose of Data Processing
purposes.item2: Communicating with clients and answering inquiries
purposes.item3: Sending newsletters and marketing materials (with consent)

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Data Processing
legalBasis.text1: The legal basis for data processing is as follows:
legalBasis.contract: Contract performance: Appointment booking and service delivery (GDPR Article 6(1)(b))
legalBasis.legitimate: Legitimate interest: Website operation, analytics (GDPR Article 6(1)(f))
legalBasis.legal: Legal obligation: Compliance with accounting and tax regulations (GDPR Article 6(1)(c))

retention.title: Data Retention Period
retention.text1: We retain personal data only for as long as necessary:
retention.appointments: Appointment data: 5 years from service completion
retention.marketing: Marketing consent: Until withdrawal of consent or after 3 years of inactivity
retention.accounting: Accounting documents: 8 years as required by law

rights.title: Data Subject Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right of access:
access.text: You can request information about whether we process your personal data and, if so, what data we process.

rectification.title: Right to rectification:
rectification.text: You can request the correction or completion of inaccurate personal data.

erasure.title: Right to erasure:
erasure.text: In certain cases, you can request the deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten').

restriction.title: Right to restriction:
restriction.text: You can request the restriction of data processing.

portability.title: Right to data portability:
portability.text: You can request to receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

objection.title: Right to object:
objection.text: You can object to data processing, especially for direct marketing purposes.

withdraw.title: Withdrawal of consent:
withdraw.text: You can withdraw your consent at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

rights.contact: To exercise your rights, please contact us using the contact information below.
rights.complaint: If you believe our data processing violates regulations, you can file a complaint with the Hungarian National Authority for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (NAIH) at: www.naih.hu, info@naih.hu, 1055 Budapest, Falk Miksa utca 9-11.

security.title: Data Security
security.text1: We are committed to maintaining the security of your personal data. We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
security.text2: Our security measures include encrypted data transmission (SSL), access control, regular backups, and ongoing training of our staff on data protection regulations.

recipients.title: Data Transfer and Data Processors
recipients.text1: We only transfer your personal data to third parties when necessary, in the following categories:
recipients.text2: We have written contracts with our data processors that ensure compliance with GDPR requirements. Data processors may only process data according to our instructions.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.text: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience and ensure the website's functionality. Detailed information about cookies can be found in our Cookie Policy.

changes.title: Changes to this Policy
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify this policy from time to time. We will inform you of any changes on our website. Please check this policy regularly to stay informed about our data processing practices.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about data processing or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
